
# required
# the url from where to download
# is in most times the url of that page, where all chapter are listed
url=

# optional
# pattern of the chapters to download
# if left empty all chapters are downloaded
# see readme for description
pattern=

# dependant
# to export the links to JDownloader add the path to the folder where jd is located
# example: jdhome=C:/Program Files/JDownloader2/
important: use only forward slashes (/)
jdhome=

# optional
# set this to use a proxy (without authentification)
# proxyHost is the proxy's url
# proxyPort is the proxy's port
# both do not have default values, when nothing is defined nothing is used
proxyHost=
proxyPort=
